verses.verse: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה׀ <S%H8010><s%> lish-lo-Moh [A Psalm] for Solomon אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, O God מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <S%H4941><s%> Mish-pa-tei-cha thy judgments לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech the king תֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> Ten; Give וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha and thy righteousness לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> le-ven- son מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech. unto the king's

יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> ya-Din He shall judge עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people בְצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> ve-Tze-dek; with righteousness וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ <S%H6041><s%> va-'a-ni-Yei-cha and thy poor בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> ve-mish-Pat. with judgment

יִשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> yis-'U shall bring הָרִ֓ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim The mountains שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom peace לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am; to the people וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> u-ge-va-'ot, and the little hills בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> bitz-da-Kah. by righteousness

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט׀ <S%H8199><s%> yish-Pot He shall judge עֲ‍ ֽנִיֵּי־ <S%H6041><s%> 'ani-yei- the poor עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am, of the people י֭וֹשִׁיעַ <S%H3467><s%> Yoo-shi-a' he shall save לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the children אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon; of the needy וִֽידַכֵּ֣א <S%H1792><s%> vi-dak-Ke and shall break in pieces עוֹשֵֽׁק׃ <S%H6231><s%> o-Shek. the oppressor

יִֽירָא֥וּךָ <S%H3372><s%> yi-ra-'U-cha They shall fear עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- thee as long as שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Sha-mesh; the sun וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei endure יָ֝רֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> ya-Re-ach, and moon דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor throughout all דּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1755><s%> do-Rim. generations

יֵ֭רֵד <S%H3381><s%> Ye-red He shall come down כְּמָטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> ke-ma-Tar like rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon גֵּ֑ז <S%H1488><s%> Gez; upon the mown כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים <S%H7241><s%> kir-vi-Vim, grass as showers זַרְזִ֥יף <S%H2222><s%> zar-Zif [that] water אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the earth

יִֽפְרַח־ <S%H6524><s%> yif-rach- flourish בְּיָמָ֥יו <S%H3117><s%> be-ya-Mav In his days צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; shall the righteous וְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> ve-Ro and abundance שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Lom, of peace עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- till בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> be-Li is no יָרֵֽחַ׃ <S%H3394><s%> ya-Re-ach. so long as the moon

וְ֭יֵרְדְּ <S%H7287><s%> Ve-ye-red He shall have dominion מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam also from sea עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam; to sea וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> u-min-na-Har, and from the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> 'af-sei- unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

לְ֭פָנָיו <S%H6440><s%> Le-fa-nav before יִכְרְע֣וּ <S%H3766><s%> yich-re-'U shall bow צִיִּ֑ים <S%H6728><s%> tzi-Yim; They that dwell in the wilderness וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו <S%H341><s%> ve-'o-ye-Vav, him and his enemies עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far the dust יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H3897><s%> ye-la-Che-chu. shall lick

מַלְכֵ֬י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei The kings תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish of Tarshish וְ֭אִיִּים <S%H339><s%> Ve-'i-yim and of the isles מִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah presents יָשִׁ֑יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shi-vu; shall bring מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei the kings שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va of Sheba וּ֝סְבָ֗א <S%H5434><s%> u-se-Va, and Seba אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר <S%H814><s%> 'esh-Kar gifts יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃ <S%H7126><s%> yak-Ri-vu. shall offer

וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> ve-yish-ta-cha-vu- shall fall down ל֥וֹ lo כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all מְלָכִ֑ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim; Yea all kings כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim before him all nations יַֽעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> Ya-'av-Du-hu. shall serve

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יַ֭צִּיל <S%H5337><s%> Yatz-tzil For he shall deliver אֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon the needy מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <S%H7768><s%> me-shav-Ve-a'; when he crieth וְ֝עָנִ֗י <S%H6041><s%> ve-'a-Ni, the poor וְֽאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ein- has עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> 'o-Zer also and [him] that hath no helper לֽוֹ׃ lo.

יָ֭חֹס <S%H2347><s%> Ya-chos He shall spare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on דַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> dal the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon; and needy וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> ve-naf-Shot the souls אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <S%H34><s%> ev-yo-Nim of the needy יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> yo-Shi-a'. and shall save

מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8496><s%> mit-Toch from deceit וּ֭מֵחָמָס <S%H2555><s%> U-me-cha-mos and violence יִגְאַ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> yig-'Al He shall redeem נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham; their soul וְיֵיקַ֖ר <S%H3365><s%> ve-yei-Kar and precious דָּמָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> da-Mam shall their blood בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nav. be in his sight

וִיחִ֗י <S%H2421><s%> vi-Chi, And he shall live וְיִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-ten- and to him shall be given לוֹ֮ lo מִזְּהַ֪ב <S%H2091><s%> miz-ze-Hav of the gold שְׁ֫בָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va of Sheba וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> ve-yit-pal-Lel prayer also shall be made בַּעֲד֣וֹ <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Do about תָמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; for him continually כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, [and] daily יְבָרֲכֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-ra-Chen-Hu. shall he be praised

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become פִסַּת־ <S%H6451><s%> fis-sat- There shall be an handful בַּ֨ר׀ <S%H1250><s%> bar of corn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-Retz in the earth בְּרֹ֪אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh upon the top הָ֫רִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of the mountains יִרְעַ֣שׁ <S%H7493><s%> yir-'Ash thereof shall shake כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <S%H3844><s%> kal-le-va-Non like Lebanon פִּרְי֑וֹ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yo; the fruit וְיָצִ֥יצוּ <S%H6692><s%> ve-ya-Tzi-tzu shall flourish מֵ֝עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> me-'Ir, and [they] of the city כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> ke-'E-sev like grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi endure שְׁמ֨וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo His name לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, shall endure for ever לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei- as long as שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ <S%H8121><s%> she-Mesh the sun; יָנִין ya-nin כיִנֹּ֪ון <S%H5125><s%> yin-Non be continued קשְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <S%H1288><s%> ve-yit-Ba-re-chu and [men] shall be blessed ב֑וֹ vo; כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim in him all nations יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H833><s%> ye-'ash-she-Ru-hu. shall call him blessed

בָּר֤וּךְ׀ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [be] the LORD אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עֹשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh who only doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> nif-la-'ot wondrous things לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do. alone

וּבָר֤וּךְ׀ <S%H1288><s%> u-va-Ruch And blessed שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name כְּבוֹד֗וֹ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Do, [be] his glorious לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וְיִמָּלֵ֣א <S%H4390><s%> ve-yim-ma-Le be filled כְ֭בוֹדוֹ <S%H3519><s%> che-vo-do [with] his glory אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> kol and may the whole הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, and let the whole earth אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> ve-'a-Men. and Amen

כָּלּ֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> kal-Lu are ended תְפִלּ֑וֹת <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lot; The prayers דָּ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, of David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai. of Jesse
